subject: Re: TAPSCON Clearwater Florida
author: kolrone
full_text:
Are you really close by? I'm about an hour or hour and a half away. I'm just north of Tampa. So I'm thinking about going tomorrow. Hopefully thewebcast will be fixed soon. I just don't want to show up and find out there is no room to go to the lectures or anything. It says a 70 person capacity for seats, and then whatever standing room there is. That to me doesn't seem like good odds, so I don't know what I'm going to do.

-Aaron
